ext_description.p: A land is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The land shall be related to exactly one as the 'instantiated template'.
The land shall be related to at most one as the 'alternate usage definition'.
The land shall be related to exactly one as a 'stratum feature implementation'.

ext_description.p: If the land has a description of 'via and contact size dependent land', or 'component termination passage and contact size dependent land', the land may relate to zero or more that has a description of 'land interface terminal' to specify the 'associated component'.
ext_description.note: A contact size dependent land may have more than one interface terminal.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: If the land has a description of 'functional land', 'via dependent land', 'via and contact size dependent land', 'component termination passage dependent land', 'contact size dependent land', or 'component termination passage and contact size dependent land', the land shall relate to at least one that has a description of 'land join terminal' to specify the 'associated component'.

If the land has a description of 'via and contact size dependent non functional land', 'component termination passage and contact size dependent non functional land', the land shall relate to exactly one that has a description of 'non functional land interface terminal' to specify the 'associated component'.

If the land has a description of 'non functional land', 'via dependent non functional land', 'via and contact size dependent non functional land', 'component termination passage dependent non functional land', 'contact size dependent non functional land', 'component termination passage and contact size dependent non functional land', or 'unsupported passage dependent non functional land', the land shall relate to at least one that has a description of 'non functional land join terminal' to specify the 'associated component'.

If the land has a description of 'component termination passage and contact size dependent land', 'component termination passage and contact size dependent non functional land', 'component termination passage dependent land', or 'component termination passage dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'component termination passage' as a 'reference passage'.

If the land has a description of 'via and contact size dependent land', 'via and contact size dependent non functional land', 'via dependent land', or 'via dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one that has a description of 'buried via', 'interfacial connection', 'bonded conductive base blind via', 'non conductive base blind via', or 'plated conductive base blind via' as a 'reference via'.
If the land has a description of 'unsupported passage dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'unsupported passage' as a 'reference passage'.

If the land has a description of either 'component termination passage dependent land' or 'component termination passage dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'default component termination passage based' as an 'instantiated template'.

If the land has a description of either 'component termination passage and contact size dependent land' or 'component termination passage and contact size dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'default attachment size and component termination passage based' as an 'instantiated template'.

If the land has a description of either 'contact size dependent land' or 'contact size dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'default attachment size based' as an 'instantiated template'.

If the land has a description of either 'via and contact size dependent land' or 'via and contact size dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'default attachment size and via based' as an 'instantiated template'.

If the land has a description of either 'via dependent land' or 'via dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'default via based' as an 'instantiated template'.

If the land has a description of 'unsupported passage dependent non functional land', the land shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'default unsupported passage based' as an 'instantiated template'.
A component_shape_aspect_subtypes shall be one of , , and (or) .
